name: TinyHorrorSQL
short_description: Very small database, forked from TinySQL (but later rewritten from scratch) for the study of good software writing and Database theory knowledge. Currently works with flat (TXT) files. Will use DBF, XLS, CSV, memory tables and SQLite formats.
